INSERT ALL
into SYS_USER_ROLE (RECORD_FLOW, USER_FLOW, ORG_FLOW, WS_ID, ROLE_FLOW, AUTH_TIME, AUTH_USER_FLOW, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW ) values (#{userRole.recordFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRole.userFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRole.orgFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRole.wsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRole.roleFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRole.authTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRole.authUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRole.recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRole.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRole.createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRole.modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRole.modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update.foreach:

where record_status = 'Y' and RECORD_FLOW = #{userRole.recordFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
